metadata.title: CVE-2019-16201 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: WEBrick::HTTPAuth::DigestAuth in Ruby through 2.4.7, 2.5.x through 2.5.6,and 2.6.x through 2.6.4 has a regular expression Denial of Service cause bylooping/backtracking. A victim must expose a WEBrick server that usesDigestAuth to the Internet or a untrusted network.

criterions.comment: jruby package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
